gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.step1: Connect your social accounts (YouTube, Spotify, etc.) in Preferences to automatically extract your preferences.
gettingStarted.step2: Or manually add your interests, genres, and event types in Preferences.

preferences.title: Preferences

socialAccounts.title: 1. Connect with Social Accounts
socialAccounts.description: Connect your accounts to automatically extract preferences from your activity.

preferencesSection.title: 2. Enter or Fine-tune Preferences
preferencesSection.description: Add your interests, genres, and preferences. If you connected social accounts, these may already be populated.

eventSources.title: 3. Enter Links for Event Postings
eventSources.description: Add URLs to venues or event providers you normally follow. These will be checked for events in your newsletter.

This is quicker and we won't share your data. Alternatively, you can manually add preferences below for more control. You can always edit preferences later, and you'll rarely need to update them‚Äîset it once and you're done.
